title: 4 Scenarios for Next Phase in Gaza War, With ‘Intense’ Fighting Set to End
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday that the conflict is about to enter a new stage. Here are four ways that may play out, both in Gaza and at Israel’s northern border.

title: In Greece, Another Tourist Found Dead Amid Scorching Heat Wave

title: Iran’s Onerous Hijab Law for Women Is Now a Campaign Issue
